__imports__comment__: List of files or resources for merge with this JSON
__comment__: Use long paths keys (eg: {"a.b.c":1}) for define JSON structures (eg: {a:{b:{c:1}}). Use "__*__" keys for technical fields.

JsBeans.name: jsbeans-local
JsBeans.__services__comment__: Ordered list of Service classes for loading
JsBeans.__waitStopTimeoutMills__comment__: Waiting timeout in mills for node stoped

servicemanager.defaultmanager.DefaultSer.__serviceStartTimeoutMills__comment__: Service starting timeout or timeout of Service.start() completetion
servicemanager.defaultmanager.DefaultSer.__serviceStopTimeoutMills__comment__: Service stopping timeout or timeout of Service.stop() completetion
servicemanager.defaultmanager.DefaultSer.__eventsMaxThreads__comment__: Max number of threads of cached ThreadPool that executing event handlers
